comment: He is as grandiose as Peterman from Seinfeld. Just sit back, break out a bottle of brandy, light a fire, and listen to the tales that are, ahhhh World Civilization. Barrow has an uncanny affinity for all things history and politics. Loved his class. He is a character. Attendance is mandatory, show up late he'll make fun of you; hilarious!

A very funny teacher due to his accent and tendency to go off subject and talk about something else. All of my assignments with him were take home so its a very easy course. This also means that there is probably no point in taking any notes, although attendance is a percentage of your grade. The classes can get very boring despite his personality.

Dr. Barrow is very knowledgable, and extremely funny.  His African accent takes a little getting used to.  Only complaint is he reads straight from the book, don't think about taking notes.  Exams are take home, and must be extremely detailed but questions are easy.  Recommended for those who don't mind old school lectures with humor.
Best teacher at this school. I reccomend that you take this class if you can. He is easy and helpful. His jokes are hilarious and he is extremely interesting.
Dr. Barrow is a great teacher. He is very knowledeable about the subject matter. He is a pretty easy grader and doesn't give many assignments.

If you don't mind writing, then this class is awesome! He reads straight from the book which can get boring, but it is worth it. The tests are easy, however you do have to write alot and they take a while to finish. He is also very funny!

Global issues by him was the most boring class in the world.  He rambled on forever and it always seem to go back to terrorism.  He would mark points off of tests for things he never even warned you about, like having to number pages.  He mostly annoyed me, but the class was easy.

Very interesting guy!!! Easy class, information is interesting...he links old history to examples of today. Show up and you will do very well. All like him, very educated man. Always positive view on everything. Test are very fair and easy to make an A if effort is applied. GREAT CLASS!!! Take him for any History class!!!!!!!

Very easy teacher. His tests are super easy (Just write a lot and u are encouraged to use internet sources) Very cool, upbeat person...Loves to joke around. I would recommend him to anyone interested.
